mapper.sql: post_id, user_id, related_question_id, create_time, visit_count, status
mapper.select: SELECT post_id, post_content, a.create_time, visit_count, question_content, u.username, u.avatar_url FROM ( SELECT post_id, post_content, p.user_id, p.create_time, visit_count, question_content FROM fy_post p JOIN fy_question q ON p.related_question_id = q.question_id ) a JOIN fy_user u ON a.user_id = u.user_id

SELECT post_id, post_content, a.create_time, visit_count, question_content, u.username, u.avatar_url FROM ( SELECT post_id, post_content, p.user_id, p.create_time, visit_count, question_content FROM fy_post p JOIN fy_question q ON p.related_question_id = q.question_id WHERE p.`status` = 0 ) a JOIN fy_user u ON a.user_id = u.user_id

select
distinct
,
from fy_post
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from fy_post
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into fy_post (post_id, user_id, related_question_id, create_time, visit_count, status, post_content) values (#{postId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{relatedQuestionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{visitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into fy_post
post_id,
user_id,
related_question_id,
create_time,
visit_count,
status,
post_content,

mapper.update:
update fy_post
post_id = #{record.postId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
related_question_id = #{record.relatedQuestionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
visit_count = #{record.visitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
post_content = #{record.postContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update fy_post set post_id = #{record.postId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, related_question_id = #{record.relatedQuestionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, visit_count = #{record.visitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, post_content = #{record.postContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

update fy_post set post_id = #{record.postId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, related_question_id = #{record.relatedQuestionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, visit_count = #{record.visitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fy_post
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
related_question_id = #{relatedQuestionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
visit_count = #{visitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
post_content = #{postContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where post_id = #{postId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update fy_post set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, related_question_id = #{relatedQuestionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, visit_count = #{visitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, post_content = #{postContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where post_id = #{postId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
